channel.title: Home on Air Lion
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Air Lion

item.title: Videos
item.description: How clean is the air you breathe? This video demonstrates smoke particles entering and moving through various vacuum cleaners. Many of these machines are high end models or popular in big box stores.

item.title: About
item.description: Back in 1989 Harold Schoettler founded an exciting new company dedicated to developing and marketing consumer home environmental products of the highest quality. SREC designs and manufacturers its products in Huntington Beach California, and distributes them to many different countries throughout the world. Schoettler Research and Engineering Corp. Designer and Maker of the Patriot Hybrid System We are Air Lion, the midwest regional distributor of the Patriot System headquartered in Madison County, Illinois.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Let us show you the cleaning power of the Patriot Hybrid Clean Air System. Call or email us to schedule an in-home demo. Day Office Hours Home Visit Hours Monday to Friday 10:00am to 5:00pm By Appointment Only Saturday and Sunday Closed By Appointment Only Holidays Closed Closed
